description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as hello, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for notesbackend, including greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root endpoint '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation at '/swagger-ui.html'

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns application health status, e.g., 'OK' at '/health'
